title: Nursing Education Course Strengthening Clinical Judgment Skills Through Virtual Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of Basic Nursing Theories and Practical Experience
context.additional_context: Blended Learning Environment Utilizing Medical Simulation Software and Virtual Patient Cases: Flexible Scheduling for Working Professionals

learning_goals: Through virtual patient scenarios, over 85% of learners can apply clinical judgment criteria.
In a blended learning environment, the ability to perform nursing intervention simulations is measured on a 3-level assessment scale, achieving a grade of B or higher.
Project-based assessments demonstrate learners' critical thinking and decision-making skills through concrete case reports.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
